---
id: reset-users-password
title: "Reset user's password"
description: "The API allows you to reset the password for a specific user, typically to trigger a password reset process or provide a new password."
sidebar_label: "Reset user's password"
hide_title: true

api: 
sidebar_class_name: "post api-method"

custom_edit_url: null
---

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Reset user's password"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/userDetails/resetUsersPassword"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



The API allows you to reset the password for a specific user, typically to trigger a password reset process or provide a new password.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
